what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal wintermovies Holiday Movies released 1929-2023 holiday movies represent different holidays season Christmas, kwanzaa Hanukkah.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version wintermovies GitHub :

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)

code: library(wintermovies) data("holiday_movies") data("cleaned_holiday_movie_genres") ## basic example code summary(holiday_movies) #>     tconst           title_type        primary_title      original_title     #>  Length:2265        Length:2265        Length:2265        Length:2265        #>  Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>                                                                              #>       year      runtime_minutes     genres          simple_title       #>  Min.   :1929   Min.   :  1.00   Length:2265        Length:2265        #>  1st Qu.:2003   1st Qu.: 68.00   Class :character   Class :character   #>  Median :2015   Median : 85.00   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   #>  Mean   :2008   Mean   : 78.44                                         #>  3rd Qu.:2020   3rd Qu.: 90.00                                         #>  Max.   :2023   Max.   :288.00                                         #>                 NA's   :189                                            #>  average_rating     num_votes        christmas         hanukkah        #>  Min.   : 1.000   Min.   :    10   Min.   :0.0000   Min.   :0.000000   #>  1st Qu.: 5.400   1st Qu.:    54   1st Qu.:1.0000   1st Qu.:0.000000   3rd Qu.:0.000000   #>  Max.   :10.000   Max.   :367288   Max.   :1.0000   Max.   :1.000000   #>                                                                        #>     kwanzaa          holiday title: Holiday Movie Genres Dataset — cleaned_holiday_movie_genres
text: dataset containing genres associated holiday movies, movie may multiple genres listed separate rows. Irrelevant genres like "Music", "Talk-Show", "News" removed.

title: Holiday Movie Genres Dataset — cleaned_holiday_movie_genres
text: data frame x rows 2 variables: tconst Unique identifier movie (character) genres Genres associated movie (character)

title: Holiday Movie Genres Dataset — cleaned_holiday_movie_genres
text: data obtained TidyTuesday project. TidyTuesday weekly data project. https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2023/2023-12-12

title: Holiday Movies Dataset — holiday_movies
text: dataset containing holiday-related movies 1929 2023. data includes movie titles, genres, IMDb ratings, holiday types (Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanzaa).

title: Holiday Movies Dataset — holiday_movies
text: data frame x rows y variables: tconst Unique identifier movie (character) primary_title Popular title movie (character) year Year movie released (numeric) genres Comma-separated list genres (character) christmas 1 movie relates Christmas, 0 otherwise (integer) hanukkah 1 movie relates Hanukkah, 0 otherwise (integer) kwanzaa 1 movie relates Kwanzaa, 0 otherwise (integer) average_rating IMDb average rating (numeric) num_votes Number votes received IMDb (numeric)

title: Holiday Movies Dataset — holiday_movies
text: data obtained TidyTuesday project. TidyTuesday weekly data project. https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2023/2023-12-12

what: Run Shiny App for Holiday Movies — run_app
title: Run Shiny App for Holiday Movies — run_app
text: function launches Shiny app included wintermovies package. allows users know holiday movies.

title: Run Shiny App for Holiday Movies — run_app
